data.name: Label_CreditTransferMessage
data.value: Please, pay the total amount mentioned above before {{ date.to_string invoice.due_date '%d/%m/%Y' }} to {{ organization.bank_account | ibanformatter }} in the name of {{ organization.description }}, stating the following payment reference: {{ invoice.payment_reference }}.

data.name: DirectDebitMessage
data.value: In the next few days, your bank will transfer the amount of <span style="font-weight:bold;color:black;"> € {{ invoice.remaining_amount | math.format "N2" }}</span > from your account to the account number of <span style="font-weight:bold;color:black;">{{ organization.description }}</span >.

data.name: Label_AdvancesDeductedFromInvoice
data.value: Overview of advances we have deducted from this settlement

data.name: Label_AdvancesDeductedFromNextInvoice
data.value: Overview of advances we will deduct from the next settlement

data.name: Label_ContactIfIncorrect
data.value: Please contact us if these data are incorrect.

data.name: Label_EmailCreditTransfer
data.value: You have an outstanding invoice of € {{ invoice.remaining_amount | math.format "N2"}}.

data.name: Label_EmailCreditTransferWhen
data.value: Please, pay this amount before {{ date.to_string invoice.due_date '%d/%m/%Y' }} into

data.name: Label_EmailDirectDebit
data.value: In the next few days, the amount of € {{ invoice.remaining_amount | math.format "N2"}} will be made payable to us.

data.name: Label_EmailPaymentCollectionDescription
data.value: Despite our payment requests, the invoices below have not yet been paid. By not paying within the agreed payment term(s), you are in default. We request and, if necessary, summon you to pay us the total amount.

data.name: Label_EmailRefund
data.value: You are entitled to a refund of € {{ invoice.remaining_amount | math.abs | math.format "N2"}}.

data.name: Label_EmailRefundPartially
data.value: We used the refund of € {{ invoice.total_amount_incl_vat | math.abs | math.format "N2"}} to deduct your outstanding balance.

data.name: Label_EmailRefundWhen
data.value: Within a few working days, you will receive the amount of € {{ invoice.remaining_amount | math.format "N2"}}on:

data.name: EmailCreditTransferMessage
data.value: Please, pay the total amount mentioned above before {{ date.to_string invoice.due_date '%d/%m/%Y' }} to:

data.name: EmailDirectDebitMessage
data.value: In the next few days, your bank will transfer the amount of <span style="font-weight:bold;color:black;"> € {{ invoice.remaining_amount | math.format "N2" }}</span > from your account to:

data.name: EmailRefundMessage
data.value: In the next few days, the amount of &euro {{ invoice.remaining_amount | math.abs | math.format "N2" }} will be transferred to:

data.name: Label_IgnoreIfAlreadyPaid
data.value: If you have already paid the amount, you can ignore this notification

data.name: Label_NoFurtherActionRequired
data.value: There is no need for you to take any further action.

data.name: Label_PayAsFastAsPossible
data.value: Please settle the following amount as soon as possible. If the total amount is not received by us on time, extrajudicial collection costs may be charged.

data.name: Label_PayBeforeExtraCosts
data.value:
The stated total amount must be credited to our account number no later than {{ date.to_string next_step.execute_at `%d/%m/%Y` }}. If the total amount is not received by us on time, extrajudicial collection costs will be charged to you.
Unless otherwise agreed with you, these costs amount to € {{ next_step.charges.charge_amount_incl_vat | math.abs | math.format "N2" }} (including VAT), that you are obliged to pay by law.
In addition, a claim is made on contractual or statutory interest from the moment you are in default.

data.name: Label_PayToAvoidAdditionalCosts
data.value: Pay in time to avoid extra costs

data.name: Label_TextForInvoicesWithoutSurprise
data.value: Together with you, we work on a settlement without any unpleasant surprises. Therefore, we charge a new advance on the basis of as many elements as possible

data.name: Label_WhatDidWeTakeIntoAccount
data.value: What have we taken into account?

data.name: Label_YourConsumptionIncludingSeasonality
data.value: Your consumption (with seasonal influences taken into account)

data.name: RefundMessage
data.value: In the next few days, the amount of € {{ invoice.remaining_amount | math.abs | math.format "N2" }} will be transferred to {{ customer.bank_account }}.

data.name: NoIbanMessage
data.value:
We don't have your bank account number.
After we receive your bank account number we can transfer the amount of € {{ invoice.remaining_amount | math.abs | math.format "N2" }}. You can pass on your bank account number via the contact info below.

data.name: SettledMessage
data.value:
Open balance in your favour was used to settle this invoice.
You don’t need to take further actions.

data.name: RefundUsedToSettleMessage
data.value: The refund amount on this invoice was used to settle your open balance.

data.name: PartiallyPaidMessage
data.value: Open balance in your favour was used to partly pay this invoice.

data.name: Label_CollectionMessage
data.value:
Despite our payment requests, the invoices below have not yet been paid. By not paying within the agreed payment term(s), you are in default. We request and, if necessary, summon you to pay us the total amount.
Please transfer the total amount of € {{ total_amount_incl_vat | math.abs | math.format "N2"}} to {{ organization.bank_account | ibanformatter }} in the name of {{ organization.description }}, stating the following payment reference: {{ payment_reference }}.

data.name: Label_ReminderPaymentMessage
data.value: Please, pay the total amount of € {{ total_amount_incl_vat | math.abs | math.format "N2"}} as soon as possible to {{ organization.bank_account | ibanformatter }} in the name of {{ organization.description }}, stating the following payment reference: {{ payment_reference }}.

data.name: Label_ReminderIntro
data.value: Our records show that the invoices below have not yet been paid despite the expiry of the payment term. The invoices may have escaped your attention. We kindly but urgently ask you to transfer the total amount of said invoices to our account as soon as possible.

data.name: Label_ContactDetailSubtitle
data.value: For questions or information, please contact us at:

data.name: Label_ContractWelcomeSubtitle
data.value: You are now officially moved in

data.name: Label_ContractWelcomeContent
data.value: Your contract has been signed and you can now enjoy our services without any worries. Below is an overview.

data.name: Label_ContractWelcomeNextAdvance
data.value: You will receive your first advance in a few days.

data.name: Label_ContractWelcomeMonthlyInvoice
data.value: You will receive a monthly invoice on day {{ contract.billing_details.invoice_day }} each month

data.name: Label_ContractWelcomeQuarterlyInvoice
data.value: You will receive your next quarterly invoice on day {{ date.to_string next_invoice_date `%d/%m/%Y` }}

data.name: Label_ContractWelcomeHalfYearlyInvoice
data.value: You will receive your next semi-annual invoice on day {{ date.to_string next_invoice_date `%d/%m/%Y` }}

data.name: Label_ContractWelcomeYearlyInvoice
data.value: You will receive your next yearly invoice on {{ date.to_string next_invoice_date `%d/%m/%Y` }}

data.name: Label_ContractTerminatedSubtitle
data.value: Thank you for having been our customer

data.name: Label_ContractTerminatedContent
data.value: Your contract has ended. You will receive an endnote from us shortly.

data.name: Label_MoveInRequestReceivedContent
data.value: We are going to get your contract in order. You can expect a confirmation email from us shortly with additional information. Below is a summary of your details. If something is still not right or if you have any questions, you can always contact us via the contact details at the bottom of the email.

data.name: Label_MoveOutReceivedSubtitle
data.value: We have successfully received your application.

data.name: Label_MoveOutReceivedContent
data.value: Our employees will deal with your request shortly.

data.name: Label_MoveInRejectedContent
data.value: Please contact us so that we can discuss your move in.

data.name: Label_MoveOutRejectedContent
data.value: Please contact us so that we can discuss your relocation together.

data.name: Label_Portal_Registration_Link
data.value: Your registration link for the customer portal

data.name: Label_AdvanceMoreInfoRef
data.value: More info about your advances on the next page.

data.name: Label_CustomerPortal
data.value: You can also view your invoices at

data.name: Label_InfoNextAdvanceAmount
data.value: Your advances will be recalculated based on your yearly consumption.

data.name: Label_LabelToDetails
data.value: You can find a more detailed overview with VAT specs on a later page.

data.name: Label_PaidAdvancesNotTakenInAccount
data.value: Paid advances not yet taken in account

data.name: Label_NoticeOfDefaultIntro
data.value: Our records show that the invoices below have not yet been paid despite the expiry of the payment term. The invoices may have escaped your attention. We kindly but urgently ask you to transfer the total amount of said invoices to our account as soon as possible.

data.name: Label_NoticeOfDefaultMessage
data.value: Please, pay the total amount of € {{ total_amount_incl_vat | math.abs | math.format "N2"}} as soon as possible to {{ organization.bank_account | ibanformatter }} in the name of {{ organization.description }}, stating the following payment reference: {{ payment_reference }}.

data.name: Label_Footer
data.value: {{ organization.description }} - {{ organization.address.street_name}} {{ organization.address.street_number}}{{ organization.address.street_number_addition}}, {{ organization.address.postal_code}} {{ organization.address.city}} - {{ organization.email_address }}</br>{{ organization.company_account_number }} - {{ organization.vat_account_number }} - IBAN {{ organization.bank_account | ibanformatter }}

data.name: Label_YourOpenAmountDisadvantage
data.value: You still had a balance of:

data.name: Label_BalanceOrigin
data.value: You still have an open balance of € {{ total_open_amount | math.format "N2" }} originating from:

data.name: Label_ChangedAdvanceInfo
data.value: Dear {{ customer.short_display_name }}, your advance amount has been changed to € {{ advance_amount }}.

data.name: Label_ChangedAdvanceApplyDate
data.value: This advance amount will be applied beginning with your next advance on {{ next_advance_date }}.

data.name: Label_MorePortal
data.value: More information can be found at {{ customer_portal }}

data.name: Label_ChangedIbanInfo
data.value: Dear, {{ customer.short_display_name }}, your IBAN has been changed to {{ customer.account_number }}.

data.name: Label_ChangedibanCorrect
data.value: Make sure this number is correct, upcoming payments to and from your account will be trough this IBAN.

data.name: Label_ChangedPaymentInfo
data.value: Invoices will be paid by {{ customer.paymentMethod }}. from now on.

data.name: Label_NextPaymentSdd
data.value: Your next payment will be made on {{ NextInvoiceDate }}.

data.name: Label_NextPaymentSct
data.value: You will receive your next invoice on {{ NextInvoiceDate }}.
